headline: Decent work environment
pros: 401k plan, small office, friendly co workers
cons: Owners are hard to talk to and are constantly watching employees

headline: Cliquey
pros: You have the freedom to work alone
cons: Can't maintain a normal conversation without it coming back to haunt you

headline: awful
pros: some friendly coworkers, decent office environment
cons: The Management is constantly thinking about replacing each team member. This company is all about cutting expenses and that means denying employees benefits or cutting them off all together.  The upper management have a very cold critical approach to worker relations. They seem to be overly paranoid that employees aren't worth their wage. They refuse to hire a janitor, a plumber, or electrician because they'd rather guilt their low end employee into doing  this kind of grunt work.  It's a group of pushers, who are constantly pressing you about the same minor annoyances.  A lot of the typical office politics.  Wage is pretty average.
